Suspend X–{X}{B}{B} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {X}{B}{B} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Whenever a time counter is removed from Emanation of Torments while it’s exiled, each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.
